products.title: Scandi Ferns Linen Summer Roman Blind
products.description: Modern decor often calls for stark, tonal designs and minimalism, but this beautiful window dressing shows just how crisply contemporary a bright but simple palette can be. products.title: Scandi Ferns Linen Winter Roman Blind
products.description: Blue is always a cooling, calming colour, but in the scandi ferns linen winter roman blind it takes on a certain vibrance, even warmth, thanks to its dense leafy pattern. products.title: Choices Scandi Ferns Linen Ocean Roller Blind
products.description: Cool tones like blue dont have to be a downer, as this beautifully bright roller blind proves perfectly.
